description: A Developer is making changes to a custom application that is currently using AWS Elastic Beanstalk. After the Developer completes the changes, what solutions will update the Elastic Beanstalk environment with the new application version? (Choose TWO)
responses: Package the application code into a `.zip` ...
Package the application code into a `.tar` ...
Package the application code into a `.tar` ...
Package the application code into a `.zip` ...
Package the application code into a `.zip` ...
